title: [1.7.10-1.7.2][InfusionCraft——注魔工艺]
author: 椎名雪穗
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱无名灬颂 于 2016-5-21 21:38 编辑 
首先...这个Mod并不跟神秘时代有关...

关于本Mod

这个Mod允许你在游戏中将不同的锭或者是别的东西融合在一起，为了达到这一目的，你将会需要一个注魔台，你可以给铁、金、红石、青金石、和石头注魔，以获得钛、银、红宝石、蓝水晶以及强化石，使用这五样材料你将制作出惊人的东西，其中之一则为法杖，魔法杖、火焰法杖以及经验法杖，你可以用它们去做一些很酷的事情，还有一些法杖像树木法杖能够砍倒整棵树啦，像冶炼法杖能够烧制用它挖下来的东西，还有粉碎者啦等等的，这里仅仅是一小部分介绍，更多信息请访问我的网站。


下载以及更多信息

所有信息都在我的网站上，它们都很详细，来这找它们吧！
在这下载最新版本吧！


目前已知注魔台的爆炸可能会使游戏崩溃
来这跟随作者吧！

Mod详细介绍

这次重点介绍这些东西

想要制作这个Mod里的大部分东西，我们需要一个注魔台，还需要大量的昂贵材料，以及对材料的注魔，在此放出所有的注魔表




stone.png (21.31 KB, 下载次数: 94)

下载附件

2015-9-5 17:38 上传





强化石，用铁为石头注魔

achievement.png (30.53 KB, 下载次数: 93)

下载附件

2015-9-5 18:08 上传





最后用成就收个尾，还是看不懂我的介绍的同学可以跟着成就走，也是一个很有意思的Mod
法杖我不多介绍了，合成表实在太多我也不一一放出来，请使用NEI或者G键合成表


更新日记

Update #8 : 10 months ago10/15/14=== New in InfusionCraft v 2.5 ===

- Removed Exploder
- Added HealingStaff
- Added DualBlade
- Added Diamond and Lapis Chunk
- Unstable Plate when dropped explodes

Update #7 : about a year ago7/06/14=== New in InfusionCraft v 2.45 ===

1) Removed Titanium Armor and Tools pre-enchantments; Titanium Armor will not give you Resistance II anymore (Heads up, it is stronger than diamond)
2) Changed recipes for Kresenko's Sword and Reinforced Chestplate
3) When you destroy and ore with Crusher, it will no longer drop cobblestone; it will replace the ore with cobblestone
4) Stepping on Infusement Table will no longer give you night vision
5) Added Blast Staff (Right-click, launches mobs into the air)
6) Blue Crystal texture improved
7) Added 10 Achievements
8) Fixed Exploder recipe crash
9) When you kill Magical Slime, the lightning will strike at you

* Only exploder keep crashing the server. I'm having a hard time fixing that; So don't use the exploder in your server

Update #6 : about a year ago6/28/14=== New in InfusionCraft v 2.42 ===

- Fixed server crases
= Fixed not rendering the lightning
- Ported to 1.7.10

Update #5 : about a year ago6/13/14=== New in InfusionCraft v 2.4 ===

- Added Amber (infuse Orange Dye with Iron)
- Added Lignite (infuse Coal with Iron)
- Added Block of Amber (created with 9 Amber)
- Added Block of Lignite (created with 9 Lignite)
- Added Unstable Plate (created with 4 Reinforced Stone; it will disappear if you drop it)
- Added Reinforced Stone Plate (obtain item by smelting Unstable Plate)
- Added Kresenko's Sword (really strong sword that gives you a lot of enchantments when crafted; repair the item with Reinforced Stone Plate)
- Added Ender Pouch (right-click to access the ender chest)
- Added Smelting Staff (it will auto smelt the block when you break it, if the block is smeltable; repair it with blaze powder)
- Shift-clicking is supported in the Infusement Table
- Added Reinforced Chestplate (really strong chestplate; it gives you resistance III potion when you equip it and a lot of enchantments; repair the item with Reinforced Stone Plate)
- Added Ruby Rod (created like a stick, but with Ruby)
- Added Tree Staff (If you break a wood block while sneaking, it will destroy whole tree; repair it with an iron axe)
- Hoe will now till 3x3 area with a single action
- Titanium armor is now a little bit stronger and it has greater durability
- Directions/facing works on infusement Table
- Infusement Table particles when active has been changed
- Added Crusher (crushes currently only emerald and gold ore; repair it with ruby in anvil)
- Added Emerald and Gold chunks
- Infusement Table when active will give out some light (same as Furnace)
- Hopper is supported with Infusement Table (Hopper on sides - iron; Hopper on top - the other slot)
- Recipes for Magical, Fire and Experience staff has been changed
- Experience Staff has now 30 uses (about 13 levels)
- Lignite can be used as fuel in Furnace (it is 2 times more efficient than Coal; 1 Lignite smelts 16 blocks/items)
- Block of Lignite can be used as fuel in Furnace (it is a little bit more efficient than Lava; 1 smelts 64+46 blocks/items)
- It takes 5 times longer to infuse something

Update #4 : about a year ago5/14/14v 2.32 - new stable version :D

- Fixed a couple of glitches (1 of them is when you step on Infusement Table you fall from the world)

Update #3 : about a year ago5/08/14v 2.31 - Stable version

- You can only imput numbers form 0-9 in Exploder
- You get resistance 2 effect if you have full set of titanim armor
- bug fixes

Update #2 : about a year ago5/04/14Added mod review to the thread. For more reviews check you my website.
The v 2.21 will come out tomorrow with new stuff!

Update #1 : about a year ago4/25/14v 2.16

- Updated to 1.7.2
- Removed Ores
- Added a lot of new stuff
